ideas.title: Minimalist Corner Setup
ideas.description: Enhance empty corners with tall indoor plants like Snake Plant or Areca Palm. Perfect for modern eco-friendly rooms.

ideas.title: Hanging Planters for Small Spaces
ideas.description: Use macramé hangers or ceiling hooks to display trailing plants like Pothos or English Ivy.

ideas.title: Eco-Themed Desk Decor
ideas.description: Create a refreshing workspace with small succulents, terrariums, or bonsai on your desk.

ideas.title: Plant Shelf Styling
ideas.description: Use wooden or bamboo shelves to showcase a mix of leafy plants and décor items for a natural vibe.
